FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: “May your veins weep, and may every vampire take notice.” —Stensian curse
« Puissent vos veines pleurer, et tous les vampires le remarquer. » —Malédiction stensienne
“Que tus venas lloren, y que todos los vampiros lo noten.” —Maldición de Stensia
„Mögen deine Adern weinen und jeder Vampir es bemerken.“ —Stenzischer Fluch
“Che le tue vene possano stillare e che ogni vampiro possa avvedersene.” —Maledizione di Stensia
「お前の血管が鳴き声を上げ、全ての吸血鬼の気を引かんことを。」 —ステンシアの呪い
“네놈이 피를 흘리고, 모든 흡혈귀가 네놈을 쫓기를.” —스텐시아식 저주
«Пусть твои вены рыдают, и пусть это почует каждый вампир». — Стенсийское проклятие
“Que suas veias gotejem e que cada vampiro possa sentir seu odor.” — Maldição stensiana

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: エンチャント（プレイヤー）
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local attach_filter = Object():AttachmentFilter_Get() attach_filter:Clear() attach_filter:SetFilterType( FILTER_TYPE_PLAYERS )

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: At the beginning of enchanted player’s upkeep, Curse of the Pierced Heart deals 1 damage to that player.
Au début de l’entretien du joueur enchanté, la Malédiction du cœur transpercé inflige 1 blessure à ce joueur.
Al comienzo del mantenimiento del jugador encantado, la Maldición del corazón perforado le hace 1 punto de daño a ese jugador.
Zu Beginn des Versorgungssegments des verzauberten Spielers fügt der Fluch des Herzschmerzes diesem Spieler 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
All’inizio del mantenimento del giocatore incantato, la Maledizione del Cuore Trafitto infligge 1 danno a quel giocatore.
エンチャントされているプレイヤーのアップキープの開始時に、貫かれた心臓の呪いはそのプレイヤーに１点のダメージを与える。
부여된 플레이어의 유지단 시작에, 꿰뚫린 심장의 저주는 그 플레이어에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.
В начале шага поддержки зачарованного игрока Проклятие Пронзенного Сердца наносит 1 повреждение тому игроку.
No início da manutenção do jogador encantado, Maldição do Coração Perfurado causa 1 ponto de dano àquele jogador.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TRIGGER: return (MTG():GetStep() == STEP_UPKEEP and Object():GetParentPlayer() ~= nil and Object():GetParentPlayer():MyTurn() ~= 0 and TriggerPlayer() == Object():GetParentPlayer())
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local player = Object():GetParentPlayer() local source = EffectSource() if source == nil then source = Object() end if ( player ~= nil ) then player:DealDamage(1, source) end

SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetFilterType( FILTER_TYPE_PLAYERS ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target_player = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_PlayerPtr(0) if target_player ~= nil then Object():AttachToPlayer(target_player) end
